ingredient_list: Chicken Breast,Thai Basil,Red Bell Pepper,Green Beans,Garlic,Chili,Soy Sauce,Fish Sauce,Sugar,Lime Juice,Vegetable Oil
step_descriptions: Dice chicken; chop basil; slice pepper and beans; mince garlic and chili; mix sauce ingredients; stir-fry chicken; add vegetables; add sauce; stir in basil; serve over rice
